::Skulletron::

	Skulletron follows Zardus to the conference room after transforming back
to robot mode, not looking to see if Feline was following.  Skulletron was
impressed by himself, when he made an actual bot smile.  He had never
actually used this ability on any bots because he was never joined with any
factions before.
